               Solid waste management generally, G.S. 130A-290 et seq.; solid waste management plans,
               G.S. 130A-294; authority to enact ordinances governing the removal, method and manner
               of disposal, depositing or dumping trash, debris, garbage or litter, G.S. 153A-132.1;
